page.title: 10EASTBOURNE PIER
page.content:
Eastbourne pier a is very good place. At the beginning of the pier they have a few shops which sell such things as, ornaments made from sea_shells,and a great variety of souveniers.On the pier there is an amusement arcade called the Blue Room.It has many types of electronic games where you can try to win some money. The pier also has restaurants,bars and a disco.In some of the bars there are entertainers who provide. You can also fish from the end of the pier,or take a ride on a speedboat. Many people simply sit on the pier and enjoy the views and the sea air.
Catherine Oliver.
